channel.title: Commands! [READ]
channel.description:
I want to add a starter to my server, but I want to configure it that a person can only do it once per account
Like, if the person says ::starter, then it gives them like 1m and some food, but if they do it again, then it says " You can't do more than one ::starter". Even if the person logs out and back in, they still can do ::starter again.

item.title: Commands! [READ]
item.dc:creator: @dkgonda dkgonda
item.description:
@dkgonda wrote:

I have a fearny-pkz source. I just want someone to tell me how to make it a one time only kind of command.

Read full topic
